# FAST.R

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of FAST.R is to launch a user-friendly R shiny app to perform the data analysis and visualization for the Fully Automated Senescence Test (FAST) workflow.

## Installation

You can install the CRAN version of FAST.R from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/) with:

``` r
install.packages("FAST.R")
```

You can install the development version of FAST.R from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("f-neri/FAST.R")
```

## Use

To launch the app, use `FAST.R()`

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(FAST.R)
FAST.R()
```
